title: Did a new book reveal President Trump's fear of Oval Office ghosts?
subtitle: The new book "Fear" is full of malignant details about President Trump's administration, but the supposed extracts documenting the President's fear of ghosts are a trick.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: According to an extract from Bob Woodward's 'Fear' book, President Trump believes that the ghosts of former Presidents are chasing the Oval Office.
